Where they live: Diamond City (mixture of Tokyo and New York)
Bio: Matilda Everlone is a very sweet girl with a seemingly ordinary life, unless you can call that given the fact that she is a 170ft tall, wearing a bikini all the time and has giant monster like abilities like being able to breathe fire from her mouth. Well let's go back to where this entire story begins. Her parents worked at a science company and one day they brought their daughter to work when they were experimenting with some new DNA sample, somehow an accident occurred and the sample tube broke right on Matilda. Suddenly, she ended up growing to gigantic height and was able to breathe fire as well. At first the entire population of Diamond City was terrified, but they soon grew to adore and like her when she showed that she was still friendly and such, and now she helps out with construction works, demolitions, and other things across the city as a creature known to all as Matildgon. She is also a huge Japanese giant monster fan, so she does act, roar, and stomp around like a kaiju all the time, but thankfully is careful where she goes and lands her stomps. She is going through some issues like being forced to live in the mountains (although the scientists grow foods and her swimsuits as clothes as the others don't work for some reason), having to wear a bikini all the time, being homeschooled, etc.
Additional Info: None

So what do you wanna do with her?

1113.content:
It was just your typical average day in good ole Diamond City all the people were just starting their daily routines going to work,kids getting on the bus for school,or just getting breakfast when out of the blue came the tremors things like car alarms went off and a few building and store department windows rattled but none of the people even bothered to scream or run around like crazy even as the huge shadow appeared blocking out the sun and all anyone could see was the massive outline of a young girl around seven years old dressed in a two piece bikini smiling down at them Matilda beamed happily as she stared at the puzzled,frightened crowds then said
"Hello little people!" Rather than run and scream like most people would do when confronted by a gigantic monster some of the townspeople simply called back

Matilda said as she slowly began walking down the street careful to where she was stepping people actually moved out of the way respectfully for the young giant then she sat down in a empty park of the street and stared down at the tiny citizens
"So how's everyone doing today?"
"Fine thank you for asking and yourself?"
"Very good I'm only going to be here for a short while as I promised my parents I would be back home around noon so before I go does anyone need any help with anything?" As she stared around for signs of trouble Matilda noticed something else,something incredibly large as big as her coming from the horizon and she gasped
"Uh oh!" It was no doubt another giant she only hoped it whatever it was was friendly and speaking of which what kind of giant are we talking about?

113.content:
Name: Chloe
Kaiju Name: Chloezilla
Age: 6
Hair style and color: Strawberry blonde with a ponytail.
Eye color: Blue
Skin: Fair.
Height: 500 feet.
Clothes: A pink one piece bikini.
Powers: She is incredibly strong and durable, and she is able to breathe underwater and can fire a beam of atomic energy from her mouth or blasts of lightning or gravity power from her hands. She can also roar like a kaiju.
Where they live: New York City
Bio: Chloe was a sweet little girl who loved small animals and sometimes got picked on at school because she was the shortest kid in her class. She often dreamed of being huge and powerful so she could help out tiny people and would never get picked on. One day, she got her wish when she was a mysterious orb of rainbow-colored light appeared in her room and was absorbed into her body. The orb made her grow to 500 feet tall and gave her incredible powers. Her parents and everyone else in New York City were horrified at first to see this titanic little girl, but Chloezilla showed them that she was a sweet and gentle kaiju girl who just wanted to help tiny people and be friends with them. She likes to play at being a giant monster sometimes, but she is always careful not to cause any actual harm, and she helps the people of New York City whenever they have need of someone very big and strong. In return for Chloe's kindness, the people constructed a special enclosure for her to live in, and even made giant toys for her to play with.
Additional Info: Before she grew, she was very close with her teenaged big brother, Zack, who often protected her from bullies or comforted her when she had a bad dream. Nowadays, she often snuggles with Zack in her sleep, and she's thrilled at being big enough to protect him now.
113.title: Free Spot 3

choices: Chloe's playful rampage is interrupted by the people needing her assitance
1132.content:
Chloezilla woke up one bright Saturday morning, her "big" brother Zack snuggled in her arms like a teddy bear. "Wake up, Zack, it's a new day!" she said as she tickled her brother gently to wake him up. "Morning, Chloe, what should we do today?" he said as he woke up, still somewhat groggy. "Well, first, let's have pancakes for breakfast, and then we can play in my virtual city!" she said as she got up and placed Zack on the walkways that their home had for normal-sized people like him. The siblings walked into the kitchen, in which there was a kaiju-sized table for Chloe with a human-sized table for her family sitting on it. However, Chloe and Zack's parents were away on a business trip, so only Zack would be eating breakfast at the human-sized table today. A huge machine made giant pancakes for Chloe, while Zack was served normal-sized pancakes by a normal waiter who worked at the facility the people had built for Chloe and her family.

After the siblings had finished their pancakes, Chloe picked up her tiny older brother and said "Ok, it's rampage time!" She carried him to her virtual reality room, which looked like a bare black and white room when not in use. "Computer, I want a life-sized city, and a helicopter for Zack so he can watch me rampage from a safe distance." Once the computer had done what she requested, Chloezilla stomped into the city and began rampaging. "Rawr! Look out, little people, here comes Chloezilla!" she roared playfully as she stomped through the streets, crushing tiny cars and buildings beneath her enormous little girl kaiju feet. Next, she blasted away a huge chunk of the city with her atomic breath, then she set a cluster of tall buildings on fire with lightning blasts from her hands.
1132.title: Show her playing with her family and her giant ...

11322.content:
(Zack's POV)

I have to admit in my head, just seeing my gigantic 6 year old sister in her cute pink swimsuit playing Godzilla in the virtual city was just a joy that I always hope that would happen, and it did. At first when she did grew I was totally terrified beyond belief, but at the very same time I was incredibly amazed that my dream did end up happening. You see, when I was young, I imagine a gigantic woman of any age in a bikini, with Godzilla like powers going on an epic rampage in the city, roaring and using their powers to lay waste to an entire city. The creature would been called Girlzilla for sure, but luckily I do have a Girlzilla now, and it is my little sister, and I am so happy for her. You know, I actually do wanna join in on the fun now.

"Hey Siszilla!" I called out to her from the helicopter. I also call her Girlzilla and Siszilla from time to time, and she doesn't mind me calling her those names, as she does like them.

"What my brother?" She asked happily.

"How would you like to play a game of...?"

(Chapters: https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it... https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it...). It seems that the love of the giant monster girls was so great, that the city of Japan decided they needed one more. Now how they did this, with a contest to see which girl has the most desire to become the biggest and most monstrous girl of them all. Well it turns out that this little girl name Soya has won that contest. She has been an avid giant monster and giantess fan when she was just young and her mother introduced her to their movies over the years, but her favorite was the crossover Shinkzukazilla vs Harukagon as her two favorite monsters battle it out in Tokyo, and immense destruction was cause. She loved it so much that she desired to be the third monster girl, and the most monstrous of them all. Well the government saw that so they used the formula created by both Haruka and Shinkzuka's DNA (at their approval) to make the girl into a giant monster as well. The city also really celebrated having another monster girl so they gave her the monster treatment (we will get into that in future chapters.). There is so much that I can get into this character that we will just have her just being started just to give her character depth. Not much but enough to get started. Shinkzuka is glad to have another giant girl to be a monster with, and while Haruka likes having another friend, she does feel the love for the giant girls is getting a little bit overhand so she tries to teach her the more easy things. Shinzuka is going to make Soya into a real monster however.
Additional Info: She has big breast for a girl her age, and she is in training so accidents will occur like crushed cars and what not. Also, Haruka and Shinzuka are big parts of the story so refer to them as well. Now we got 3 monster girls now. She is also the most monstrous of the 3 girls with her roars and immense strength. The whole city will know her as a true monster.

115322.content:
Soya or known by her full name Soyasaurous was incredibly nervous today as she had just met two other gigantic girls close to her own height and was about to be trained by both named Haruka and Shinkzuka both all too glad to do so in how to be a monster or to put it mildly a Kaiju.

"Okay Soya here's the first thing you have to do....." Said Haruka the first of the girls as the three were at a vast distant location faraway from the population practicing "First crouch down and try to build up the energy within you and......" But the other girl spoke up

"Eh? Maybe we should save the energy bursting thing for later for now let's just focus on the easy stuff." Shinkzuka said firmly

"Right,right okay first thing pretend you're in a populated city stuffed with people who just noticed you appearing over the horizon and they just started running and screaming now what do you do?" Harkura asked

"Eh? Try and convince them that I mean no harm?" Soya said both other girls exchanged eye rolls

"Eh no! You can do that a big later! Right now we're just starting out well the first thing you do is simply take your first steps into the city,roar a few times and...." But Soya interputted her

"Those things I already know I mean come on its basic Monster lesson 101 isn't it? I thought you guys were going to teach me something really useful about this whole 'Kaiju' thing?" The other girl spoke up

"We are! But we're starting at the bottom of the barrel so to speak so you can get the hang of it now as Harkura said following a few stomps and a couple of roars to spook the crowd a bit then you want to unleash a few fiery blasts at buildings and........."

"Ahem....." Said Harkura clearing her throat

"I mean just continuing walking down the street scaring the folk for a bit then just for fun unleash one or two fire blasts......" But once again she was interputted

"I was wondering for a while now girls what exactly does a Kaiju do? I mean what is the purpose?" Soya asked

"Er you take this one I'm not sure how to explain it!" Shinkzuka said to Harkura "After all she's your trainee isn't she?"

"You're kidding right? You watched plenty of Godzilla movies haven't you? You've been a fan of our work(gesturing to her and Shinkzuka)? There's a lot more to being a Kaiju or giant monster of any kind or species than just rampaging and destroying stuff we can be good or evil or a mixture of both depending on our personalities so in other words we can either choose to be the city or town's savior or destroyer now as for our powers well it all depends on the source of our origins or creations basically we can possess every type of power or super-power under the sun okay? You understand the basics of what it means to be a Kaiju now?" Soya nodded

"Yeah I guess so alright after the rampaging and roars and energy blasts what happens next?"

"Well that's normally around the time when the military shows up and a stand off begins between the Kaiju and them being that you're a Godzilla fan you probably know what happens then either we can surrender to them or resist and try and destroy them in the process or often ourselves." Harkura explained

"And that's it?" Soya asked feeling a bit let down

"Yeah pretty much unless we forgotten something did we?"

"Nope I don't think so....oh wait one more thing if another giant monster shows up and a fight breaks out between the two the best thing to do is to either fight like mad or just try and get out of there especially if the other monster is more experienced than you but that's always not the case remember that bigger doesn't always mean better or stronger!" Luckily she is careful not to crush anything with her feet, and the roads are built with her mind where the main traffic is on to the side, with the middle is suited for her. She even did a few cute little roars in the process as well to let them know she is coming by.

Fun fact, this was only the morning, so Asukazilla has more to do in the city, so what does she plan to do next?

She could be heading to the city where they want her to test out some new clothes, mainly swimsuits for people to take pictures of her. She doesn't mind only wearing swimsuits though, because she likes how it feels on her, and how easy for them it is to make them for her.

Another huge thing she also really enjoying doing is playing with kids in the park. The kids really really adored her, and she does adore them to. There she likes letting them play on her, and she also likes acting like a cute monster around them, and even lets them feel a bit of her power, etc. Its also why she got the name Asukazilla, as a kid call her that one day when she was young, and she liked it so much, she would roar anytime said that name.

Another thing she could be doing is helping the police catch criminals and keep emergencies under control like earthquakes, etc. No monster invasion in this story however given the rules, but situations that has Asukazilla rescuing people easily, etc.
13422.title: Asuka's feeling a little hungry

choices: Asukazilla gets asked to do a T.V commercial
Auskazilla wants to try a new set of clothes
Auskazilla leaves to hang out with her parents
134221.content:
Auskazilla smiled brightly as she posed for the cameras. She loved the attention she got from the local citizens and traveling tourists. Especially when she was given the chance to try out some of her new monster poses or be seen in new clothes.

Those new clothes being a spring green swimsuit made specially for her. The material was apparently made from the finest silk and lined with material so smooth that she felt as if she was being hugged by clouds. Was comfort like this supposed to even exist?

Probably not, but she wasn't going to complain. Instead she was going to do what she did best, and that's wow her adoring public. She squatted down and reached her hand out as if she was going to grab a nearby building. This was what was known as her "Monster Snatch" pose. It wasn't necessarily new, but there were many variations of it.

The people down below cheered as she switched positions and made sure to snap as many shots as possible. No doubt some these pictures would make it online or on the local news. After all she had a whole section of the news dedicated solely to her. How long before she got a movie deal or something? That would be really cool.

She then hopped up, and did her horned pose, which consisted of her sticking up her index fingers out on the sides of her head. This was one of her favorite poses. This was the one she did most when she was still a normal sized person playing around in the land of fantasy.

"Make sure yo get my good side." Auska giggled.
134221.title: Photo Shoot

choices: Auska has a hard time finding everyone
134222.content:
If there was one thing Auskazilla loved just as much as her monster status, it was playing in the park with adoring fans. To her they were the absolute best and what really reaffirmed her love for the monster archetype she embodied.

They were her everything outside of her family and even gave her the nickname everyone knew, which is why she went out of her way to be extra good to them. Like right now as she sat in the park while her peers used her as a jungle gym.

She smiled brightly as her fans used her hair as a rope swing, or tried making her leg into a slide. Honestly it didn't get any better than this. Just nonstop laughter and happiness. The way it should always be.

Auska even did her famous roar for them as she knew they'd love it. Unfortunately her self proclaimed number one fan Mayl Keioha wasn't here. Normally the girl was at the park whenever she was around, but today she was surprisingly absent. Maybe she was out with her family or something?

Oh well, maybe she could set-up some personal hang out time with her the next time she saw her. Out of everyone she enjoyed her company the most when playing. The two of them could talk for hours on end about monsters and clothes.

Auska was broken from her thoughts when she felt something poking her foot. She looked down to see another one of the children smiling at her. "Auskazilla!? Will you play hide and seek with us?"

She loved hide and seek. "Sure. The usual rules?"

The girl nodded. "Mmhmm! You count to a hundred while we hide. The big oak tree is home base!"

"You're on." Auskazilla cheered as the last of the children rolled down her body like a slide.

"Great!" The girl smirked. "We'll all win this time! Everyone... SCATTER!"

And just like that everyone ran off in different directions as Asuka closed her eyes. She was undefeated at Hide and Seek and wasn't about to let her record be broken. There were ten kids in all, and she would find them.

"You're all toast!" Asuka hammed. "The big bad monster is gonna getcha!"
134222.title: Playtime in the park

134223.title: Pick a scenario

choices: Auskazilla arrives to lift the ship out of the water
Auskazilla finds the ship completely under water
Everyone abandoned ship and is now floating at sea
1342231.content:
"Can anybody out there hear me!? We're in need of immediate assistance!?" A man yelled through the phone. "I repeat, we're in need of immediate assistance. The S.S RYU is sinking!"

The man screaming was none other than Ryuji Kazama, a local rich boy of Kayuko City... and also the mayors spoiled son. What was supposed to be a relaxing trip from the U.S to Japan had turned into a real nightmare when the ship made contact with a local mountainside.

Now the damn thing was sinking fast and the captain was the first to abandon ship, leaving him and any remaining passengers fighting for survival. All the life boats where gone, and the people left onboard were in a frenzy. He just so happened to be one of the only few to remember he had a cellphone on hand.

"Hello? This is Response & Rescue, how may we serve you today?" A female voice answered on the other end.

"Finally!" Ryuji whined. His tux was soaked and he was pretty sure his new Rolex was finished. He was 24 damn it, this kind of crap wasn't supposed to happen to him. "My names Ryuji Kazama, and the S.S RYU is sinking! Save me! Oh... and uh, everyone else!"

"Just hold a moment." The woman said calmly. "Now can you tell us your exact location at this time?"

"I'm in the bridge watching the fish go by! I'm freakin' trapped in here!" Ryuji yelled.

"Sir? I meant were out at sea are you located." The woman answered in her same neutral calm. Her voice was really starting to piss Ryuji off.

"THE AUSKA TRIANGLE!!!" Ryuji screamed.

"I see." The woman said unfazed. "Well sit tight we'll send someone right over. In the meantime would you like to answer our over the phone survey about--"

Ryuji hung up his phone. He hated surveys. "Bitch." he whispered.
1342231.title: S.S RYU

Model shoot: One thing that Asukazilla which she had was actual,clothes, but she doesn’t mind being in her bra and underwear all the time. choices: Cassie tries to be nice to Kyle.
1411.content:
It had been about 2 weeks since Cassie grew. She was so big that the citizens of Featherbeak City had to clear a large space in the middle of the city just for her to sleep. However, sleeping became a tad bit difficult for her, because she would be woken up in the middle of the night by tiny little cars driving by. She also hasn't been eating very much. Due to her size, she's been eating trees from a nearby forest. She hates it, and wishes she could eat real food, but she hasn't been able to in 2 weeks. She's been beginning to starve. And another thing. Nobody will go anywhere within 5 feet of her. They're just too afraid of her.

One day however, a young man named Kyle moved to Featherbeak City from Seattle, WA. He had read stories about giantesses on the internet, and was brave enough to walk over to Cassie and try to talk to her.
1411.title: Yeah, let's go with her.

choices: Cassie's stomach. Time to head to the forest.
14112.content: "Finally", thought Cassie. "I finally got someone's attention." The young man in front of her had brown hair and blue eyes. He wore a buttoned up collared shirt, blue jeans, and dark colored boots. "Hi", he said with a slight southern accent. "The name's Kyle. What's your name?" "I'm Cassie", replied Cassie. "But everybody here calls me Blondezilla." The two of them looked deep into each other's eyes. Finally, Cassie asked, "Are you new here?" "Yes", replied Kyle. "Well, if you need a place to stay, you can stay with me if you want", Cassie offered. "Sure", Kyle agreed. Suddenly, Kyle heard a loud rumbling noise.
14112.title: Cassie tries to be nice to Kyle.

141121.content: "Sorry", Cassie apologized. "That was my stomach." "W-what do you eat", Kyle asked nervously. "Well", replied Cassie. "After I grew, I've been eating trees. They're the only things big enough to fill my appetite. I just wish they tasted better." Kyle felt very sorry for Cassie. He wished there was something he could do to help.
141121.title: Cassie's stomach. Time to head to the forest.

1411212.content: "I have an idea", Kyle said. He went around the city until he found a bakery. "I need a 20.5 foot cake", he told the baker. The baker was a little confused. "Don't tell me it's for Blondezilla, is it", asked the baker. What does Kyle do?
1411212.title: "All you have to do is take a cup of flour..."

choices: Cassie starved to death before Kyle arrived.
14112121.content: "Yes, it is", replied Kyle. Nobody in Featherbeak City really liked Cassie. "Absolutely not", the baker yelled. "I'm not making anything for that b-." He was about to say (I can't it here, in case anyone under 18 is reading this), but was cut off when Kyle told him that Cassie would squash the baker if he didn't do as he was told. "Alright, fine", the baker grumbled. Within an hour and a half, he baked a 20.5 foot cake. "That'll be $300", the baker told Kyle. Kyle paid for the cake, and, with the help of a tow truck, brought the cake to Cassie.
14112121.title: Tell the truth.

141121211.content:
Cassie was delighted that Kyle brought her a really big cake. "Thank you", she said. "No problem", replied Kyle. The two of them ate the cake together and it was delicious. They decided to become best friends. They told each other about their lives up to that point. Cassie found out that Kyle moved to Featherbeak City to go to college and study computer programming. Cassie told Kyle that she had to drop out of college after she grew. Suddenly, Kyle realized something was wrong. The moving van that had all of his stuff hadn't arrived, and it was 7:00 A.M. "Don't worry", Cassie said. "I'll make a little bed for you until the moving van arrives." That night, Kyle slept in his makeshift bed, which was positioned right next to Cassie's cute face.

Early the next morning, the moving van finally arrived. Kyle unloaded his stuff and arranged it within the gated area in which Cassie lived. After having breakfast, Kyle asked Cassie what she wanted to do that day.
141121211.title: Piece of Cake

choices: Cassie and Kyle offer to help.
Cassie and Kyle quickly head back to the city.
1411212112.content:
"Let's go to the railway", Cassie replied excitedly. The AFR (Ashton Finel Railway) was a nearby railway that was established a very long time ago. It had steam, diesel, and electric engines. One diesel, nicknamed The Little Diesel Engine, was shunting freight cars into a siding for another engine to pull. Another engine, a steam engine nicknamed Big Green, was pulling a passenger train. The railway would take passengers to and from many places, including Seattle, WA, England, Scotland, Australia, Japan, China, France, Germany, Russia, and other places.

When Cassie and Kyle arrived, the Head of the Railway was furious. "What's she doing here", he shouted. "I can't run my railway with her stomping about!" Kyle was rather annoyed. "We're only visiting", he said. Just then, heard a loud horn. Cassie looked down and noticed her foot was on one of the tracks, and was blocking the path of a freight train that was heading in her direction. Cassie tried to move her large foot out of the way, but it was too late. The freight train crashed into her foot and came right off the track. Luckily no one was hurt, but the engine and the freight cars were piled up in a heap, with the caboose and the last two cars still on the tracks. The Head of the Railway was really angry now. "Look what you've done", he exclaimed. "Who's going to clean up this mess!?"
1411212112.title: Accidents Will Happen

14112121121.content: Cassie and Kyle offered to help. Kyle helped pick up the debris and Cassie picked up the engine and the broken freight cars and put them back on the rails, while a breakdown train came and cleared the freight cars and the caboose and brought the engine to the repair shed. The Head of the Railway said, "Thank you", and Cassie and Kyle headed back to the city (which wasn't very far). When they got there, Cassie was very tired. "I think I'll take a nap", she told Kyle.

143.title: Free Spot 3

choices: Diana is on her way to the bookstore
Diana is on her way to the airport to pick up her parents
1431.content:
Diana sighed as she did her best navigate the streets Town-City. One again she managed to accidently crush some poor unfortunate soul's car underneath her massive foot. No doubt that'll be another lawsuit for her parents since the city stopped insuring people for any damage she accidently caused.

Navigate the city at your own risk the mayor said.

That had become the man's slogan over the years. It was literally plastered over most of the billboards across town. That didn't do much to help her image. She was broken from her thoughts at the sounds of car horns down below. Apparently she was clogging up the road.

"Move it will ya!"

"I got places to be!"

"You're feet are blocking the road!"

It went without saying, the people didn't like her. "Sorry." she apologized before taking another step. As she did the shockwave of her footfall obliterated the windows of the nearby buildings. Again she sighed. No matter how hard she tried she would always break something every time she ventured into the city.

Oh how she missed the days when she was younger and shorter. 15ft tall might've not been very normal, but at least she could still fit in the buildings. Now, such a thing was a complete impossibility.

"Watch it freak! You almost stepped on me!" another civilian raged.

"Sorry." Diana repeated. Sorry, might as well be her favorite word. She certainly said it often enough. "I'll just get out of your way."

The little man watched on angrily as the giant stepped over him and continued her trek through the city. "Freak." he cursed. That giant bimbo crushed his freaking hot dog cart. It was as flat as a pancake. If she weren't so damn big he sue.

Diana tried her best not to wince when she heard the sounds of crushed metal, shattered glass, and curses down below. They were all unavoidable things that came with the territory of being a giant. She didn't like it, but she accepted it.
1431.title: Dianazilla

choices: The bookstore owner doesn't like Diana
14311.content:
Unfortunately for the city at large, Diana's unintentional path of property damage would continue until she reached her destination. Each and every step shook the ground and more than a few car alarms blared as a result. Not to mention the honking of annoyed drivers and angry rants of civilians persisted.

"Would you hurry up!"

"I'm walking here!"

"You just smashed my window jerk!"

"Why do you even still come through here!?"

That last comment really struck a nerve, though she hid her wince well. The still came through the city because it was her home, she loved this place despite how the people felt about her. She didn't want to leave, she wouldn't, she couldn't. Even though her parents suggested doing just that she was against it. She knew they loved this city just as much as she did.

So all of them would simply endure. It was selfish, they all knew that, but this was home.

Diana simply ignored the rest of the rants and carefully tip-toed her way through the streets. FYI, it did very little to mitigate the property damage. The smashed motorcycles parked off to the side only confirmed this.

"My Bike!" A biker cried, coming out of the bar.

"My baby!"

"My pride and joy!"

"Get the hell out of here you freak!"

Diana didn't need to be told twice. She picked up the pace and kept moving. Eventually she spotted what she was looking for. A small shopping center with an empty parking lot. Hallelujah! Empty parking lot meant less destruction. The giant carefully stepped over the cars and people down below and into the empty parking lot.

Finally, she had a little room to stretch her legs. It also helped that the buildings here were small and gave her more than a little elbow room. It felt good.

Her eyes then scanned around area and fell upon her target... the Book-It Books store. It was one of her favorite places to frequent as it more often than not had every book she came looking for. Because of her size she couldn't read books anymore so she relied on her parents to do so.

She came here so often in fact that the city put a pop off skylight in the ceiling so she could shop here without accidently destroying the place.

Thank goodness.
14311.title: Book-It Books

143112.content:
Diana carefully knelt down in front of the bookstore, taking extra care not to let her legs bulldoze the little shop. The last thing she wanted was extend the property damage bill her parents would receive any further than she already had. Money might not be an immediate issue due to her parent's line of work, but it could still dry up eventually.

With a steady hand, Dian reached for the glass skylight and carefully dug her nail under the side to pop it open. The whole set-up honestly reminded her of a pop top can or a pickle jar, minus the twisting. She could still remember when she was smaller and her father would struggle to open the pickle jar and ask her to do it. She would make it look so easy too and her father would try to save face saying her loosened it.

That was a happy memory from a simpler time.

Anyway, back in the present she carefully popped the skylight off the building and gently put it off to the side. It was also her job to put it back when her business concluded.

Meanwhile inside the stores owner groaned behind his desk when he felt the familiar tremors approaching. The mutant was back again. Old man Sonny hated when Diana came around as it would ward off any potential business. No one wanted to come to a place frequented by a circus act.

He of course kept these thoughts to himself however as he didn't want to risk pissing off a woman that could reduce his place of business to rubble. Add to that whenever she did come around she was a heavy spender. Money was money after all and he didn't mind taking it.

So he merely grumbled as toughed out the constant footfalls and watched as his skylight was popped off. Thank god the city had enough sense to listen to his request to get the damn thing put in. He didn't want his livelihood to accidently end up like Town-City fitness center. He shuddered at the memory.

"Excuse me, Mr. Gleason?" Diana began as he watched her from the open skylight. "I'm here to pick up my order."

"Yeah, yeah." He mumbled before reaching behind his desk and pulling out a large and heavy bag filled with books. It took everything he had to sling the bag over the desk. He wasn't as young as he used to be. He just turned 60 for crying out loud. "Will you be paying with cash or credit!?" he wheezed.

"Credit." she answered. Sonny watched as the giant girl raised her arm up high, exposing her armpit before she used her free hand to run a fingernail up it. She then lowered that fingernail down into the shop where the foul stench of sweat hit his nostrils.

Diana unfortunately didn't have any pockets and so she had to stash her normal sized wallet somewhere she'd be able to find it. Her mother suggested this method and she didn't bother to question her on the matter. If it worked than it worked she guessed.

Sonny on the other hand was trying his best not to gag. He spotted the young woman's wallet in the a pile of built up dirt and sweat from her armpit. Powering through the stench he reached into the woman's fingernail and plucked the wallet before taking out her card and swiping the purchase.

As long as she paid he'd be applicable he told himself.

He placed the wallet back where he found it. "Alright. You're good to go."

Diana nodded and scraped her nail against her pit again before plucking the bag of books from the desk. "Thank you." she smiled. She knew old man Sonny didn't like her, but she appreciated the fact he never voiced his discontent.

"Yeah, yeah. Just remember to put the skylight back." he waved off.

Diana nodded and did just that. With the skylight back in place and her purchase made, she stuffed the bag under her pit and continued her trek through the city.
143112.title: It's For the Money

choices: Diana manages to stop the chase
Diana fails to stop the chase (More destruction)
1431122.content:
Unfortunately for Diana, her trip through the city was met with more scathing remarks as she unintentionally destroyed more public and private property. This time however she couldn't hide her wince as while stepping through the streets she accidentally stepped on a statue if the mayor for his re-election campaign.

"That's not good." Diana commented as she raised her foot to see the stature was now little more than rubble, add to that chunks of it were stuck to the bottom of her foot as well. Without thinking she scrapped her foot along the ground, which in tern caused her to punt a defenseless through the air.

The crash that fallowed brought her attention to what she'd just done. "Sorry."

"Be more careful next time you dame klutz!"

"Get out of the road!" Another driver honked.

"Mommy, is the mean giant gonna kick us too!" a child asked.

"Just don't look at her Billy."

All around her Diana could hear the negative statements beginning to pile up. Oh the news was gonna have a field day with this one. She could already see this moment added to their, ''What has Dianazilla Destroyed Today'' segment. Talk about adding insult to injury.

The voices continued to insult her until the blaring of sirens caught everyone's attention. The police! Were they there for her!? She was too big to be arrested hence they never tried, but who knows, maybe they figured out a way?

Everyone turned their heads towards the sound only to see the red Dodge Charger speeding by with three squad cars in hot pursuit. They weren't there for the giantess, they were after criminals that could actually fit into a prison cell.

The next thing everyone heard was the sound of gunfire. The individual or individuals in the Charger were opening fire on the police!? In broad daylight no less.

Diana saw all of this transpiring thanks to her size and wondered if she should intervene. She'd never tried to aid the police before and that maniac behind the wheel was swerving all over the road like a drunken roller-skater on ice.

If she did stop them, then would the people look at her different? Would they accept that she did something good for them? She did work construction and deconstruction jobs from time-to-time. So just maybe...
1431122.title: Opportunity

choices: Take us back home, want to talk to you about some stuff
Perhaps we go see a movie down by the drive in
Perhaps spend some time on the beach
14312.content:
Diana was on her way to pick up her parents from the airport after coming back from a trip overseas for a business meeting. The parents have always loved Diana in spite of her sizes, and they did everything they could to help her. I mean they sow together her dress from many different clothes for an 80ft girl all things considered. Her parents constantly have to deal with all of the lawsuits and everything that Diana’s destruction unintentionally causes, but that is also why they were lucky to have good jobs and that Diana actually has her supporters helping her whenever she can.

Eventually after much further walking, and sadly more crushing of stuff, she reaches the airport where she sees her parents waiting by the door. She smiles just as she bows down to her knee and lets them onto her hand.

“Oh hey Diana, I assume you ended up crushing a few things getting here. Well, man you wish you are small.” Her mother said with a sighed smile, but also with annoyance because of the lawsuits heading their way possibly.

“Yeah, no kidding. Close calls, etc, good thing our jobs keep us able to be one step ahead.” Diana added.

“True, on that. Its not easy being big. I mean, all the harassment you get, especially from your school, that ended up making you leave.” The father added as well, but also it was true sadly. During Diana’s years, she was always teased for being big and massive. Other than a few friends, and her early years at school being pleasant, the remaining years gotten to be a huge problem for her. People mock her clothes, the damage she causes, and among other things, they were just jerks to her. It got so bad that she dropped out and was home-schooled by various tutors to get her GED, I mean its a sad memory for her to deal with, but its true.

“So, where do you want me to take y’all?”
14312.title: Diana is on her way to the airport to pick up h...

choices: Diana's father tells her how she became a giant
Diana's father is interrupted by an important phone call
143121.content:
"Take us back home, we need to talk to you about some things." Diana's father answered.

"Indeed we do." Her mother agreed.

"Alright." Diana nodded, this must be about something very serious. "Keep your hands and feet inside the palm at all times and be sure to get comfy."

Diana wasn't necessarily the funniest person, but the small smiles on her parent's faces let her know the joke landed and the serious aura surrounding them seems to dissipate somewhat.

"You got it dear." her mother giggled.

"Don't worry, we'll be fine." her father waved off.

Diana smiled back. "Good."

The family of three began their journey back home, a small path of destruction in their daughter's wake. It couldn't be helped given her 80ft stature, but as parents it still took a lot to not yell back when someone said something derogatory about their child for things beyond her control.

At least the walk wasn't long.

What would've been an hour long trip from the airport on foot was only about five minutes for their daughter. One of very few benefits of being a giant. Eventually the family of three made it to the city outskirts deep within the mountains. Diana kept walking until she reached a large cave the surprisingly enough she was able to just walk into.

Inside said cave was a lot of room for her to maneuver and what appeared to be a very large blanket that served as her bed. Beside that, perched atop a large rock was a small mansion. This was their happy home.

Diana lowered her hand onto the rock for her parents to get off. "Final stop, home."

Her parents said their thanks before getting off. There was no place like home. Ever since their daughter's massive growth spurt it became impossible to live in the city so they used their vast resources to hire some people to cut a cavern within the mountains and build them a home. They've been here ever since.

"It feels good to be home." Diana's father stretched. The plane had been so cramped.

"I know what you mean. It's nice to have a little elbow room." the wife answered back.

"No one know the feeling better than me." Diana emphasized be stretching her arms. "So what was it that you wanted to talk about?"

"Right." Her father nodded rather nervously. Even her mother looked slightly concerned. "You might want to take a seat for this one."

Diana not fully understanding why her parents were so nervous did as instructed. The impact of her sitting shook the mansion, but otherwise everything was fine.

"Well... where do I begin?"
143121.title: We Need to Talk...

choices: Diana takes a walk through the city
1431211.content:
"So..." Diana's father began, "You know how you've always been a... big girl ever since you were born?"

"Yes?" Diana answered unsure of where her father was going with his question. She'd been a big girl all her life, heck when she was younger she was 15ft tall which was completely unheard of.

Her father began to look even more nervous now. Just why did he look so concerned and unsure? "R-right. A-anyway, your uh... condition is, uh...."

For some reason her father couldn't get the words out and was trying his best to tell her what she needed about her condition. What he knew she wasn't sure and even her mother was looking at him with a small frown.

"If your having trouble I can tell her for you--" her mother cut in.

"No! No that's alright. I can do this." her father assured.

"Dad?" Diana called. "You know you can tell me anything, right?"

The normal sized man looked towards his daughter and back towards his wife. He needed to tell Diana the truth. She had a right to know. He took a deep breath and sighed. "It's my fault." he whispered.

"I'm sorry. I didn't catch that." Diana frowned.

"I said it's my fault!" her father shouted. "It's my fault your 80ft tall!"

Diana's mom looked taken aback by her husband's shout. It was then she realized just what he said. Her eyes went wide with worry and turned her said to see there daughter looking at him with shock written clear across her face.

"What!?" she breathed.

"It's my fault your an 80ft giant!" her father reaffirmed. "I'm the one who ruined your life before it even got started! I'm... I'm sorry! I'm so, so, sorry!"

"What do you mean! How is what happened to me your fault!" Diana asked, her voice slightly raised.

The man hung his head in shame. "Years before you were born I used to work as a journalist for the Town-City Chronicle. I was doing a report on a woman who claimed to be a legit sorceress and of course like a lot of people I thought she was a fraud. Oh how wrong was I..."

Diana listened intently and her mother looked more and more concerned.

"Madame Ruby her name was, and to think I thought she was another con artist looking to exploit the weak minded. I wanted to teach her a lesson she'd never forget so I cut a deal with the Town-City News Network (TCN). I was going to expose her in front of the whole world."

Diana could feel her fists tightening as she listened on.

"She came in ready for an interview and as soon as the cameras were rolling I called her out. I put her on full blast for the whole world to see and made her look like a fool. I called her names, insulted her craft, and was a complete shit heel. She actually ran out of the studio crying."

Diana's mother hung her head now.

"After the segment was over my superiors told me I did a good job and I left to go to my car. When I made it the parking lot she was there with some weird kind of diamond encrusted skull. It started leaking some kind of red mist that she blew in my face and cursed me. She said I'd bring misery to my family should choose to have one."

Diana was biting her lip now.

"I thought she was full of crap and told her to never come near me again. A few years later I lost my job and met your mother. After couple more years we got married and you were born. The rest as they say, is history." her father finished.

Everyone was silent. The long stretch of quiet was maddening. That was until Diana broke it. "Why didn't you ever tell me before?"

"Guilt mostly." her father answered before looking away.

"Please understand, Diana. We didn't say anything because we didn't know how you'd handle it. And also because we spent years trying to track Madame Ruby down." her mother tried explained.

Diana didn't know how to handle this information overload. It was too much. Way too much. Her parents knew why she was an 80ft freak and yet chose not to tell her. This was her life, she had a right to know. Worse yet her father was the one who caused it and let her believe her situation was her own doing.

Just how was she supposed to react.

143121132.content:
"Daniel... Daniel... Danny?"

Someone was calling him. Slowly he creaked open his eyes, only to immediately shut them again in discomfort. The light was so damn bright, and why the hell did his head hurt so much?

"Danny, wake up!" the hazy voice ordered. He knew that voice, it was his wife Demi. Said wife eyed her husband with worry as he laid across the couch reeking of booze. In fact, the whole living room was filled with bottles. "Dani please wake up!" she begged.

The desperation in her voice seemed to rouse him again. He turned to face her with squinted eyes, it was then he noticed she was fully clothed. "What's going on? You going somewhere?"

"Yes, and you're coming with me! Now hurry up and throw on some shoes!" she said quickly.

Daniel took note of her urgency and struggled to sit up. God his head was killing him. "Demi? What's going on?" he asked again.

"It's Diana! She didn't come home last night!" She answered.

That woke him up. Suddenly the events of last night came back to him in full force. The plane ride home, the walk home with Diana... the truth, and finally that look of betrayal in her eyes and sadness in her voice. He'd hurt her and she walked off to be alone.

Instead of going after her like he should have he threw himself on the couch and drank until he passed out. He cursed himself for his own cowardice. This was all his fault! He should've done something! His only daughter was hurting because of him and instead of trying to ease the situation he looked for solace at the bottom of a glass. Pathetic!

Ignoring the splitting headache he felt at the moment, he got to his feet and threw on some shoes. "C'mon, it'll take a while to reach the city, even by car!"

Demi nodded sadly, "Right.'

----

It took a while to reach the city by car, but when they did they were surprised to see so many police cars and yellow tape. Not to mention people arguing with officers about the closed off road.

"You don't think..." Demi began.

"No question." Daniel sighed from behind the wheel. This was no doubt Diana's doing. Who else could completely tear up a road and smash as many cars Diana? Answer: Nobody.

"C'mon, let's go around and fallow the carnage."

Just as he was about to back up a tomato of all things hit his windshield. "What the hell?" Demi panicked.

"This is all your freak of a daughters fault!" a man shouted. This drew the attention of the rest of the crowd.

"Yeah! Because of her I'm gonna be late to my sons baseball game!"

"I'm a doctor, I can't afford to be late to work!"

"That bitch crushed my car!"

That last one got both parents pissed, but they knew two against forty weren't good odds. Instead, Daniel merely scowled and used his windshield wipers before backing away. He didn't have time for these clowns. He needed to find Diana and tell her he's sorry.

Demi continued to shoot death glares at the crowd and the police who were conveniently looking the other way. "Bastards." she whispered. She then looked back her husband as he turned the car around to fallow the destruction. He put on a tough front for the crowd but she knew the truth.

Inside, he was hurting.

"You shouldn't have to constantly apologize." Diana's mother began. "None of this is your fault."

Diana in tern gave them a sad smile. "I know and it's okay. Also I think I see the drive in coming up."

The family did their best to ignore the less than pleasant civilians in favor of the drive in. It looked like it was going to packed since it was monster move night and the sun appeared to be going down.

Because of her size watching normal TV was out the question, but giant movie screenings were something she could do. It also helped that the drive in was more than large enough to accommodate her 80ft frame.

"Diana? Why don't you put us down and go find a seat while I pay for the flick?" Her father suggested, to which she obliged. She gently lowered her parents to the ground and walked into the center of the drive, taking extra care not to accidently crush any cars or people nearby. Thankfully she found a spot she could sit as a few patrons had the sense to back their cars up when they saw her coming.

"I wonder what's playing." Diana wondered as she felt something poker her foot. Sure enough it was her parents with bags of popcorn. Lowering her hand to let them up, Diana's placed her parents on her shoulder to get comfortable. "What's playing?" she asked.

"Some old horror movie." her mother answered.

"The real horror here was the ticket prices." her father joked. "Popcorn?"

"That sounds nice." Diana smiled as she opened her mouth for her father to thrown popcorn in. She couldn't really taste it due to her size, but it was still a nice gesture.

The sun soon vanished however, and the last of the cars pulled in.

It was time to watch a movie.

She needed to remember what her parents taught her.

To never use her size to hurt or bully others. Especially people who couldn't fight back and or were ignorant to her situation.

She wasn't a bully, a goddess, or some sort of monster. She was just an 18 year-old girl who just so happened to be the tallest human being alive, and could wipe out whole cities if she ever decided to expand her size further.

She loses confidence, she steps on more thing, apologizing constantly
1541.content:
Stephanie is at the outskirts of a mock up town. Building and vehicles are crudely made, but still made to scale. Cardboard cutouts representing people have been made to populate it. They used to use actual vehicles and voluneers, but with how often she would trip or step on things, this set up was best.

         Stending on the top of a platform, Alice looks at Stephanie. "Okay, Momzilla," she begins.

         "Please, you know that name makes me feel uncomfortable," Stephanie says as she nervously rubs her arm.

         "Sorry," Alice apologizes. "Lookk, this is the standard suburban scenario. You're goal is to reach your house, which has been spray painted in red, while cauing as little collateral damge as possible, okay? There is no time limit today, so take your time."

         Stephanie sighs, feeling nervous. She always ends up stepping on several things. Taking a deep breath, she takes her first step, doing her best to remain confident. She iss walking slowly, avoding the cars and people, actually making it down the street without causing any damage or "casualties". Sh smiles a bit feeling a bit confident. She feels something beneayh her foot, looking down to see she stepped on a minivan, which isn't even as big as her foot.

1551.content:
Name: Luna
Kaiju Name: Luna (Same as her real name)
Age: 23
Hair style and color: straight purple hair, shoulder length.
Eye color: red
Skin: white
Height: 303ft
Clothes: A simple plaid blue and white skirt, long black socks that reach her knees, and black sneakers.
Powers: Nigh-Invincibility (She's ALMOST invincible) Ignoring physics, (For example there will NOT be massive gusts of wind or tidal waves when she moves) Weather manipulation, flight, and soul manipulation
Where they live: Tokyo Japan

Bio: Luna is the sister to another girl who has gone down in legend as the fire goddess, they say she has outgrown the planet but no one knows if this is true, even Luna herself doubts that her "sister" exists however upon reaching her 21st birthday Luna had not only grown to her 100m (303ft) size but awakened to various powers as well, half of her wants to rule the world, the other half...just wants to be loved

Additional Info: When manipulating someones soul Luna can drain it from someone leaving them as a literal zombie (Not like a zombie outbreak just someone without emotions doomed to wander for all eternity) she can also place this soul inside another body. It's a complex ability but fun to play around with. Luna can even summon the souls of the dammed to do her bidding as well, despite her seemingly evil side, she's VERY CONFLCITED with her powers ruleing the world, destroying it, both sound good, yet at the same time...she'd also like to be loved.
1551.title: Free Spot 5

15513.content:
Luna was conflicted to say the least, people knew of her existence yet not what she could do. Other than her size she had rarely used her powers openly before. It made quite an impact on the internet however. "I heard she can breath fire!" or "She can shoot lasers from her eyes I bet!!" and "I bet she's actually an alien from another world!!" Millions of rumors, none confirmed, Luna didn't read these posts however, she spent most of her time in a sort of stasis. A sleep-like state where she would merely think, what went through a being like her mind. Thoughts about this 'sister' that perhaps was merely made up so she did not feel alone? Maybe thoughts of how to use her powers? One could only guess.

What was actually going on was Luna feeling sick, not in body but her emotions, with powers like hers she was a threat to the world, so how does one so powerful just...blend in? Maybe if she were normal sized she wouldn't have troubles, and if she were to conquer the world then it would be under her rule, or if she were to just "Lose it" and destroy it...what would be the point, power like this was terrifying to her. Yet as such a young adult she didn't have guidance. A soft voice snapped her out of her thoughts.

"So you're Luna? Wow...you're beautiful!" Looking down at her leg she saw
15513.title: First use of power

choices: Luna takes a walk carrying Nanami
Luna doesn't want to go anywhere
Luna takes a walk but doesn't quite care what she steps on.
155132.content:
Luna was shocked. for someone to even approach her was rare. There was another girl in the area but Luna didn't quite know her, not very well anyways. "Yes..." Was all Luna said. The girl was rather tall herself at around 6'6, maybe? She had pink hair, likely dyed and wore a white dress open in the front showing off her long toned legs. Rather large breasts as well. Luna had to admit for a human she was rather good looking. "And you?"

"Nanami." The girl said bowing politely.

"Don't bother bowing." Luna snapped. "Bowing is for a person to a person in this country, I'm not a person."

"I disagree." Nanami said with a smile. "You're just big and powerful. But you're still a person." Luna was shocked. She held out her hand and lifted the girl by her very soul. The girl floated into her hand. "You're not wrong, I can raise the dead to do my bidding, I can call meteors down. Souls which hold creativity are...especially powerful. Although I can make the powers they dream up my own and real too as I drink them in. Of course this makes them mindless zombies."

"That's scary." Nanami said as she took a seat on Luna's palm.She still smiled though.

"Why do you smile. I can easily do the same to you!!" Luna growled.

"But you won't." Nanami gave a heartwarming smile. "I know you won't."

"How?" Luna asked with cold eyes.

"Simple." Nanami rubbed Luna's palm with her hand. "Because you're happy to have someone to talk to, but you're also afraid of being hurt again."

"WHAT?!" Luna half yelled. It was enough for Nanami to cover her ears. "How did you know this?!"

"Because...Your words maybe cold but your facial expressions show pain and confusion along with a deep amount of sadness." Who was this girl? How did she see so well? Luna sighed. Nanami was right.

"You're not wrong..." She mumbled.

"Hey? Lets go for a walk, you could carry me and we can talk about stuff...please?"
155132.title: A young woman?

155133.content: Say, maybe a bunch of children, boys and girls visiting a goddess?
155133.title: Any other choices?

choices: Yes, Luna takes their advice to heart and decides to do some good deeds
No, but appreciates them for advice though
1551331.content:
Luna looks below to see at least 3 kids standing before her feet, all of elementary height roughly. Luna and see that two of them are young boys no older than 10, and the youngest one of the group was a girl at the age of 6. (I know it isn’t much kids, but figured that a group doesn’t always have to be so many.) They were wearing the standard school uniforms that their high end schools provided them, and just seeing them before her, she could only leave with a bit of a soft smile as cold as she might see to be. She is still a bit cold, but she leaves a bit of a smile.

“Hi little ones, just coming to see me.” She said, slightly annoyed, but softer than her other responses.

“Yeah Luna, just coming to see you. Anything up lately?” The young girl then asked her, hoping to cheer her up a bit. “You look so down.”

“Yeah, that is true, maybe I am just homesick or something. I mean, being big and powerful surely doesn’t leave you a lot of opportunities to have fun or be useful, unless you are Soyumi, Sakura, or those others who seems to being monsters all the time with monster names that y’all call us. I swore someone call me Lunazilla, but I just wanna be called Luna.” She said a bit down, but smiled a bit.

“So, you just wish you can be useful at your massive height with your powers?” One of the boys asked. “i think you could make an incredible superhero.”

“You know, I think I could. That is actually a great advice there. But let me ask you all this, especially the girl. If you were this big and everyone sees you like a monster, how would you feel?”

“Well, that depends if they are scared of just love me.” The girl replied.

“I guess you have a point there... I mean, I just want to be useful for a change around here. But... I wish they can see me for the real me, and not just some towering monster sized girl like they do with Sakura and Soyumi and many others, and if by some means y’all were giants, don’t you want to be seen for the kind person that you are, or just some monster?”

“Ourselves.” They said.

(Remember they are no male giants, but I figure I state a question here for them in order to get Luna to teach a good lesson.)

“Say, you should go out every so often and try being more open?” the girl then said, hoping to get Luna to go out for a bit.

Does it succeed?
1551331.title: A Soft Smile in her Heart

1552.content:
Name: Sakura Ekizo
Kaiju Name: Called various names like Sakurazilla, the Goddess of Beauty and Destruction, Terror Titan, among others, and she really enjoys being called those names.
Age: 22
Hair style and color: A simple short but not too short blackish brown hair
Eye color: Green
Skin: White
Height: Her forms can range from 100ft as a youngest kid form around age 6, to her current state of 300ft as an adult, she can adjust her height and age appearances at her own will, each with their advantages and disadvantages (She is still 22, but her personality explains her abilities)
Clothes: She wears a gold like slippers and only wears a white bra and panties outfit, but has a solid body. Her age changing abilities also affects her clothes as well, allowing them to adjust.
Powers: Near invincibility like Luna, fire breath, monster roar, regeneration, and also age adjusting, also body manipulation of her breasts and butt if she wanted to
Where they live: Just like Luna, Tokyo in Japan, but also tends to visit other cities in Japan as well.

Bio: Sakura is currently a descendant of the goddess of destruction and beauty who has recently went on to the next stage of their goddesshood, She is next in line and has prepared her whole life for this moment. Deep down she wants to be a friendly and helping, but also an awesome goddess who will take their rightful place as rulers, but let’s just say she is going to have a blast while she does it. She and her mother over the young years have watched plenty of monster movies like Godzilla and Gamera as she imagine herself as a kaiju and wants to take a spin on her time as goddess while also still being friendly as well. Her mother is extremely supportive of her and being a fan of the Goddesses herself, she can see why she is one day hoping for that. Then one day it has finally happened, and Sakura became a goddess herself and awakens her powers. But one power she finds interesting other than her giant monster like ones like roars and fire breath, is how she can adjust her age and body appearances, letting her change her height as well in the process. She imagined her self as a kid one day and then suddenly she is then a kid again in appearance and height wise, getting her dream in the process. Then she adjusts back at her own choice, and it does. Well, the rest of the story comes soon so let’s get into the writing.

Additional info: She is a really fun loving girl, but is lucky to be careful with what she does as a goddess, but a part of her fun is acting like a giant monster attacking the city. So she stomps around and roars like kaiju a lot, and even rises from the ocean or makes big monster openings as well. She currently has lots of fans, especially children who she is a sucker for as she wants to bring joy to the world, and sometimes uses her younger forms to be like a kid monster to them. She does plenty of favors around the city also, like demolitions and stuff,

Big note, this story takes place in the same universe as Luna’s, so refer to this link here for more details.

https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it...

So where do you wanna start?
1552.title: Free Spot 6

choices: She takes them to see a playful rampage with their teacher
She decides to play with the kids a bit
15522.content:
A new day dawn’s on the goddesses reign over Tokyo, Japan as the people of the city were seen going to work or school depending if you were an adult or kid. The streets were bright and was busy with all the usual traffic that you would expect in a major city like this, but there is something that now heads this way that is going to make their normally boring day a true site to behold.

Out in the ocean, there was a sudden shift of water as it seems to be a figure heading toward’s the city. Even the ground was rumbling really hard as the figure was actually underwater, stomping towards the city. Under the water was Sakura herself in her adult form, ready to give the appearance of a life time. Sakura was smiling just as she approaches the city that she calls home, as she was going there today to have some giant sized fun, and as a goddess, she comes here regularly to visit, and luckily all the people were nice to adjust their roads and everything to allow the goddesses to roam the city, and soon the appearance of her would been seen.

Some kids were playing at recess by a school near the ocean when they see the waters rapidly acting up, and then a kid who was just a young girl turns her attention to the ripples in the water. “Hey fellas, look at this.... Sakura is about to appear.” She shouted. Suddenly, all the kids and their teacher who was happy then turn to see the figure begin to rise out of the water. First revealing brow in hair, along with the white face with brown eyes. She was smiling just as she rises from the water, revealing more and more, like her bra and panties just as she awakens. After she was fully out of the water, stomping right near the school and a random area at 300ft tall, she then emits a kaiju like roar in the area, and it was so loud and defeaning that many covered their ears, and it sounded monster like. It lasted for a few seconds before suddenly she turns to see the kids there, and she smiles. “Well hi there little ones, I am the mighty Sakura, Goddess of Beauty and Destruction.” She roared! And all the kids cheered for their goddess.

What does she do?

info.brief_description: Trying to have a normal life is hard when you're gigantic...
info.description:
Disclaimer here. This story is only mention to be for entertainment and to only be treated as such, so don’t take anything here too seriously. I have had people come and tell me that on this type of stuff, so I do encourage y’all not to be those types of people. Yes they are kids in this story, but don’t think that this is a pedophile story. I am only making this interactive for entertainment, nothing else.

You know, sometimes life is extremely tough for everyone, and sometimes life is like given to you on a silver plate. Well in this new giantess story, you get to see a new side of life that you have never seen the girls before. The girls by some means grew to gigantic monster like sizes and you would think they would become good or evil, but in actually, they are just trying to go through the same thing we do in life. Go to school or work, learn or work, go to bed, sleep, etc. Well imagine having to do all of that as a giantess with giant monster like powers and is known to the people as a giant monster, either accepted and loved by the public, or feared and trashed by everyone. The difference in this story is that they don't go suddenly on a huge rampage and kill everything and everyone, here they are trying to solve this life problem without violence. Hence the title of this new giantess kaiju interactive... "A Typical Life as a Kaiju Giantess".

Now of course it ain't all typical, sometimes they can be well known and liked as a celebrity. But the difference in this kaiju giantess story is that they are going through life issues, but on a whole another scale, one that is gigantic sized. And also they have other issues like how to get around the city without destroying stuff, clothing they were, where they live, and etc. I kinda want to go for that type of feel in this new story. Slice of Life Drama Sci-Fi Fantasy kaiju adventure. Who knows, maybe some romance even.

Also, all of the giant girls in this story will have a kaiju name, and if you want to be simple, just add a Zilla at the end of the name. The government will register that being as a kaiju.

Alright, time to get to the rules.

No Male Giants

No Vore since this is not an evil story as I am focusing on life issues on this one, and other stuff, don't want this turning into an eating story

No sexual content for the younger than 13 crowd, please, I will get in real trouble for this

No unbirth

No switching genders

No nudity

Please make your additions at least a paragraph long, as I will delete those who break this rule
No scat

You can make more than one giantess in a route

Leave more than one option for the other guys so they can make their characters when you use the open slots (which will be made soon)

The format must be completed in its entirely for the character to be made, now if you have a photo of the girl you want to use, you can ignore the hair style, skin, eye color, and clothes part, just put a link of the photo at the end, and make sure it's workable

Scale-wise, 12 inches is a foot. Perhaps for Kaiju size, time it by 40 or 50.

Have fun

And the format to make your character

Name:

Powers: (This is a kaiju story so they will have some)
Where they live: (Can be a fictional city)
Bio: (Explain how they grew, and their whole background story)
Additional Info: (This is optional, but any other details we should know)
